channel.title: Help with my server
channel.description:
Ah, im having major issues with my server...i want to make the command ::char work for all people, that way they can change their character, or perhaps just teach me hwo to make the make-over mage do it that'd be helpful
also...i want to change the prices in the stores...how would i go about doing that??? Because in 1 shop my abyssal whip is set at 68k, then another store its 74k.
Thanks in advance
~Kx

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

For the price you must open item.cfg
then u see something like this:

item = 4151   Abyssal_whip   A_weapon_from_the_abyss.   400000	400000	400000	0 102 0	0 0 0 0	0 0 0 52 0

The first 4000000 is the high alch price the second is the shop price and the last one the low alch price.

So change the shop price in the price you want. And Change the high/low alch to.(same as your shop price).
Now u have your shop price.

But if u have in your first shop already 10000 whip’s then is the price to sell (for me) 360k
And if u only have 10 whips in your shop the price can be 400k
You get what i’m saying? The amount of whips in your shop can change the price a little.

If you have questions ask it!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @KxWarrior KxWarrior
item.description:
@KxWarrior wrote:

well i sent you a msg. i’ll be waiting

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Zero_XL Zero XL
item.description:
@Zero_XL wrote:

  1. search for (char) in client.java, see if the rights is higher than 0, if so change it, not sure if ur source has rights to it or not, also could be ::redesign instead of char for most ppl…

  2. the first 3 series of numbers in item.cfg after item names and ids, are shop prices, adjust to ur liking, sorry i dont have an example atm…

Read full topic
